trans-unit.source: Provides a dialog box, which prompts for account information of a Windows Service application.
trans-unit.target: 提供對話方塊，提示輸入 Windows 服務應用程式的帳戶資訊。

trans-unit.source: Normally, you do not use the ServiceInstallerDialog class directly within your code; this dialog is generally used by the installation utility for a Windows Service application.
trans-unit.target: 一般來說，您不使用 ServiceInstallerDialog 類別直接在您的程式碼; 內這個對話方塊通常供安裝公用程式的 Windows 服務應用程式。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> object has the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> set to `User`, and either the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> is an empty string (""), then the installation utility uses ServiceInstallerDialog to prompt for these values.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>物件具有<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A>設`User`，任一個<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>或<xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>為空字串 ("")，然後安裝公用程式會使用 ServiceInstallerDialog 提示，這些值。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>

trans-unit.source: ServiceInstallerDialog derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>; use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class methods and properties to display and manipulate the dialog.
trans-unit.target: ServiceInstallerDialog 衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>; 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>類別方法和屬性來顯示和操作對話方塊。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: For example, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> to display the form, and then check the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> before validating the input text for the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>顯示表單，然後檢查<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A>之前驗證的輸入的文字<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > ServiceInstallerDialog does not check the credentials and privileges for the specified account.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ServiceInstallerDialog 不會檢查認證與指定之帳戶的權限。

trans-unit.source: For example, the user might enter an invalid account name and password for the computer, or the account might not have the correct privileges to run as a service.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用者可能輸入不正確的帳戶名稱和密碼的電腦，或帳戶可能沒有正確的權限，以服務方式執行。

trans-unit.source: Validate the user input to ensure that the installed service runs successfully.
trans-unit.target: 驗證使用者輸入，以確定已安裝的服務能夠順利執行。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the service account form.
trans-unit.target: 初始化服務帳戶表單的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> form has its <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> set to <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>, the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> set to an empty string (""), and the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> set to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>表單有其<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A>設<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>、<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>設為空字串 ("")，而<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>設為空字串。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>

trans-unit.source: Begins running a standard application message loop and displays the service account form.
trans-unit.target: 開始執行標準應用程式訊息迴圈，並顯示服務帳戶表單。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on a new <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> form; it is typically used for testing purposes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>新<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>形成; 它通常用於測試目的。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> on the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> form to display the dialog box in your application.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>上<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>表單，以在您的應用程式中顯示的對話方塊。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the password for the service account form.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定服務帳戶表單的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> does not validate the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> and Password values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>不會驗證<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>和密碼值。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>

trans-unit.source: The dialog checks that the user confirms the password, but it does not authenticate the account credentials on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 對話方塊會檢查使用者確認密碼，但不會驗證帳戶認證，在電腦上。

trans-unit.source: A string representing the password in the service account form.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示服務帳戶表單中的密碼。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets the dialog result for the service account form.
trans-unit.target: 取得服務帳戶表單的對話方塊結果。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> to prompt the user for the service installation account, then check the Result value.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>若要提示使用者提供服務安裝帳戶，然後檢查結果值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>, verify that the input <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> are valid.
trans-unit.target: 如果值為<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>，確認輸入<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>和<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>有效。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult"></xref> indicating the user response to the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult"> </xref>指出使用者回應對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_OK" name="OK" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_OK" name="OK" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name for the service account form.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定服務帳戶表單的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> does not validate the Username or <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>不會驗證使用者名稱或<xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>值。</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the user name in the service account form.
trans-unit.target: 表示服務帳戶表單中的使用者名稱的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。
